author: Hayley Moller
title: 14 Pickup Lines for Trump’s America
text: Environmental/climate comms. Repping @UCLA & all things California. Enthusiast of denim & beards, preferably worn together. just now 14 Pickup Lines for Trump’s America With Valentine’s Day just a week away and the end of democracy arguably much closer, here’s your go-to guide for continuing to getting laid — because really, what else is left? Photo cred: @DPRK_News on Twitter “Let’s make like Scott Pruitt and the fossil fuel industry and get in bed.” “More like #NoBanNoWall NoClothes …amirite?” “If I’m Donald Trump, then you must be a rich straight white man — because I don’t care about anyone but you.” “Are you a new Executive Order? Because you came a lot faster than expected.” “You can call me DAPL, cuz I’m gonna enter your tribal lands.” “Let’s make like Trump and lose two restrictions every time we add another restraint.” “It’s a good thing you aren’t Muslim or I’d have to ban you from touching my shores.” “Are you running into my arms, or just away from the White House?” “Let’s role play: I’ll be Donald Trump and you be Steve Bannon — you can use me however you want.” “Are you smuggling a protest sign in your pants, or are you just happy to see me?” “If you’re Donald Trump’s candidacy, then I’ll be business conflicts, racist comments, lies and sexual assault — I’ll never cause you any harm!” “If I were a member of Congress I’d use the Congressional Review Act to repeal your clothes.” “Let me be your Secretary of Education — unlike Betsy DeVos, I can actually teach you something [in bed].” “Are you a top, or a Paul Ryan?”
